### Description:


I hold a PhD in economics and I am currently working as a professor in statistics and economics in uOttawa and McGill and as postodoctoral fellow at uOttawa. 

My specialty is to use statistical tools for causal inference (treatment effects) and prediction (machine learning). I have used these tools in my own research and also taught them at the university level. <br>

I am on the job market for 2021.
